title: Collaboration-Based Online Vocational Language Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and comprehension of basic terminology in the relevant field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Learners enhance job-specific language skills through collaborative learning and feedback in a non-real-time LMS environment using digital devices. Practicality is validated via project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize specialized field-specific language (medical/legal/technical) required in workplace situations with at least 80% accuracy.
Conduct at least three projects where learners collaboratively solve language-related problems with peers through cooperative activities.
Reduces language errors by over 50% through feedback-driven learning processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
